以.definition: to use; by means of; according to; in order to; because of; at (a certain date or place)

以一馭萬.definition: to control a key point is to be master of the situation (idiom)

以上.definition: that level or higher; that amount or more; the above-mentioned; (used to indicate that one has completed one's remarks) That is all.

以下.definition: that level or lower; that amount or less; the following

以下犯上.definition: to disrespect one's superiors; to offend one's elders

以不變應萬變.pinyin: yi3 bu4 bian4 ying4 wan4 bian4
以不變應萬變.definition: (idiom) to deal with varying circumstances by adhering to a basic principle

以人名命名.definition: to name sth after a person; named after; eponymous

以人廢言.definition: to reject a word because of the speaker (idiom, from Analects); to judge on preference between advisers rather than the merits of the case

以便.definition: so that; so as to; in order to

以偏概全.definition: (lit.) to take a part for the whole; to generalize

以儆效尤.definition: (idiom) to warn against following bad examples; as a warning to others

以免.definition: in order to avoid; so as not to

以其人之道，還治其人之身.pinyin: yi3 qi2 ren2 zhi1 dao4 , huan2 zhi4 qi2 ren2 zhi1 shen1
以其人之道，還治其人之身.definition: to use an opponent's own methods to obtain retribution (idiom, from Song dynasty neo-Confucianist Zhu Xi 朱熹[Zhu1 Xi1]); to get revenge by playing sb back at his own game; to give sb a taste of his own medicine

以利亞敬.definition: Eliakim (name, Hebrew: God will raise up); Eliakim, servant of the Lord in Isaiah 22:20; Eliakim, son of Abiud and father of Azor in Matthew 1:13

以利於.definition: for the sake of; in order to

以卵擊石.definition: lit. to strike a stone with egg (idiom); to attempt the impossible; to invite disaster by overreaching oneself

以外.definition: apart from; other than; except for; external; outside of; on the other side of; beyond

以太.definition: (loanword) ether (hypothetical medium that transmits light waves)

以太網絡端口.pinyin: yi3 tai4 wang3 luo4 duan1 kou3

以失敗而告終.pinyin: yi3 shi1 bai4 er2 gao4 zhong1
以失敗而告終.definition: to succeed through failure; to achieve one's final aim despite apparent setback

以夷制夷.definition: to use foreigners to subdue foreigners (idiom); let the barbarians fight it out among themselves (traditional policy of successive dynasties); Use Western science and technology to counter imperialist encroachment. (late Qing modernizing slogan)

以子之矛，攻子之盾.pinyin: yi3 zi3 zhi1 mao2 , gong1 zi3 zhi1 dun4
以子之矛，攻子之盾.definition: lit. use sb's spear to attack his shield (idiom, derived from Han Feizi 韓非子|韩非子); turning a weapon against its owner; fig. to attack an opponent using his own devices; hoist with his own petard

以小人之心，度君子之腹.pinyin: yi3 xiao3 ren2 zhi1 xin1 , duo2 jun1 zi3 zhi1 fu4
以小人之心，度君子之腹.definition: to gauge the heart of a gentleman with one's own mean measure (idiom)

以少勝多.definition: using the few to defeat the many (idiom); to win from a position of weakness

以工代賑.definition: to provide work to relieve poverty

以弗所書.definition: Epistle of St Paul to the Ephesians

以弱勝強.definition: using the weak to defeat the strong (idiom); to win from a position of weakness

以強凌弱.definition: to use one's strength to bully the weak (idiom)

以後.definition: after; later; afterwards; following; later on; in the future

以微知著.definition: see 見微知著|见微知著[jian4wei1-zhi1zhu4]

以德報怨.definition: to return good for evil (idiom); to requite evil with good

以慎為鍵.definition: to take caution as the key (idiom); to proceed very carefully

以暴制暴.definition: to use violence to curb violence

以暴易暴.definition: to replace one tyranny by another; to use violence against violence

以期.definition: in order to; hoping to; attempting to; waiting for

以本人名.definition: under one's own name; named after oneself

以柔克剛.definition: to use softness to conquer strength (idiom)

以權壓法.definition: to abuse power to crush the law

以權謀私.definition: to use one's position for personal gain (idiom)

以次.definition: in the proper order; the following

以此.definition: with this; thereby; thus; because of this

以此為.definition: to regard as; to treat as

以此類推.definition: and so on; in a similar fashion

以死明志.definition: to demonstrate one's sincerity by dying

以毒攻毒.definition: to cure ills with poison (TCM); to fight evil with evil; set a thief to catch a thief; to fight fire with fire

以淚洗面.definition: to bathe one's face in tears (idiom)

以為.definition: to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)

以直報怨，以德報德.pinyin: yi3 zhi2 bao4 yuan4 , yi3 de2 bao4 de2
以直報怨，以德報德.definition: to repay kindness with kindness, and repay enmity with justice (idiom, from Analects)

以眥睚殺人.definition: to kill sb for a trifle

以眼還眼.definition: an eye for an eye (idiom); fig. to use the enemy's methods against him; to give sb a taste of his own medicine

以眼還眼，以牙還牙.pinyin: yi3 yan3 huan2 yan3 , yi3 ya2 huan2 ya2
以眼還眼，以牙還牙.definition: an eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth (idiom); fig. to use the enemy's methods against him; to give sb a taste of his own medicine

以禮相待.definition: to treat sb with due respect (idiom)

以老大自居.definition: regarding oneself as number one in terms of leadership, seniority or status

以老賣老.definition: variant of 倚老賣老|倚老卖老[yi3lao3-mai4lao3]

以至.definition: down to; up to; to such an extent as to ...; also written 以至於|以至于[yi3 zhi4 yu2]

以至於.definition: down to; up to; to the extent that...

以致.definition: to such an extent as to; down to; up to

以致於.definition: so that; to the point that

以華制華.definition: use Chinese collaborators to subdue the Chinese (imperialist policy)

以藥養醫.definition: "drugs serving to nourish doctors", perceived problem in PRC medical practice

以虛帶實.definition: to let correct ideology guide practical work (idiom)

以言代法.definition: to substitute one's words for the law (idiom); high-handedly putting one's orders above the law

以言代法，以權壓法.pinyin: yi3 yan2 dai4 fa3 , yi3 quan2 ya1 fa3
以言代法，以權壓法.definition: to substitute one's words for the law and abuse power to crush it (idiom); completely lawless behavior; Might makes right.

以訛傳訛.definition: to spread falsehoods; to increasingly distort the truth; to pile errors on top of errors (idiom)

以資.definition: by way of; to serve as

以身作則.definition: to set an example (idiom); to serve as a model

以身報國.definition: to give one's body for the nation (idiom); to spend one's whole life in the service of the country

以身抵債.definition: forced labor to repay a debt

以身相許.definition: to give one's heart to; to devote one's life to

以身許國.definition: to dedicate oneself to the cause of one's country (idiom)

以身試法.definition: to challenge the law (idiom); to knowingly violate the law

以逸待勞.definition: to wait at one's ease for the exhausted enemy; to nurture one's strength and bide one's time (idiom)

以鄰為壑.definition: to use one's neighbor as a drain; to shift one's problems onto others (idiom)

以防.definition: (so as) to avoid; to prevent; (just) in case

以防萬一.definition: to guard against the unexpected (idiom); just in case; prepared for any eventualities

以饗讀者.definition: for the benefit of the reader
